channel.title: Mindset on Uppertonic
channel.description: Recent content in Mindset on Uppertonic

item.title: A New Start
item.description: Starting with you Are you back into your usual routine? Perhaps there seem to be so many tasks on your plate, your head feels in the clouds. Perhaps you want something to change but you just can’t see how. When it’s a bit foggy it can seem easier to carry on as usual. If you’ve read this far, you’ve already stopped for a few moments and maybe curious to start making that difference… easily.
